snippet: In a commercial that was shot Tuesday, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg and his Boston counterpart, Thomas M. Menino, push for stricter gun control laws.
abstract: New York City Mayor Michael R Bloomberg and his Boston counterpart, Mayor Thomas M Menino, will air a Super Bowl ad in which they rib each other before declaring their mutual agreement on the need for stricter federal gun control law; the two are longtime allies on the issue and the founders of a group called Mayors Against Illegal Guns.
lead_paragraph: In a commercial that was shot Tuesday, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg and his Boston counterpart, Thomas M. Menino, push for stricter gun control laws.

headline.seo: Bloomberg and Menino in Super Bowl Ad for Gun Control
headline.main: During Super Bowl, for 30 Seconds, 2 Mayors Will Be on Same Side
headline.print_headline: During Super Bowl, for 30 Seconds, 2 Mayors Will Be on Same Side
